name: Arisha Mays
bio: Arisha Mays is a certified software engineer with over 3 years of demonstrated success in web building and graphic design. Arisha Mays is a recent graduate of Spelman College and a current student at General Assembly's Software Engineering Program. Arisha specializes in full-stack web development and offers a variety of skills including critical and innovative thinking. She has excellent communication and organizational skills. Arisha has successfully built full-stack CRUD web applications using frameworks such as React, Express, and Node.JS.
